verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In Rose Garden remarks at the White House] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: called] [ARG1: his plan] [ARG2: the " most sweeping action in history to lower the price of prescription drugs for the American people] . "
In Rose Garden remarks at the White House , Trump called his plan the " most sweeping action in history to [V: lower] [ARG1: the price of prescription drugs for the American people] . "
